title: Jim Gamble puppet classics
creator_credit: David Touster, Jonathan Bogner and Bogner Entertainment
brief_description: Jim Gamble has been making puppets for many years, including a period making puppets for Disneyland. In this series of delightful puppet plays he brings some of the most well-known children’s stories to life.
creator_credit_for_label: David Touster, Jonathan Bogner and Bogner Entertainment
